pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:0.5_0: The training rule on scattering rice
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.11_0: if he discards rice while discarding trash;
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.12_0: They burn in times of trouble,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.15_0: The eighth rule, the training rule on weavers, is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six scattered rice while eating. ...
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.3.1_0: “‘I will not scatter rice while eating,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.4_0: he should not eat scattering rice about;
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.5_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, smeared with rice while eating, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
